templateData.kat:
The Scatha Pet can have its rarity upgraded from {{Rare}} all the way up to {{Legendary}} by Kat. When upgrading [[Pets]] through Kat the pet will keep all of its Pet Experience. However due to the scaling EXP needed the pet will lose some [[Pets#Leveling|Pet Levels]] depending on the new rarity. Kat will reduce the amount of {{Coins}} needed per level of the Pet. This discount is {{color|green|0.3%}} per level of the base price. {{Kat Cost |cost_rare_level_1 = {{Coins|125,000,000}}
64 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_stone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Hard Stone]] [[Enchanted Hard Stone]] |cost_rare_level_100 = {{Coins|87,500,000}}
64 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_stone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Hard Stone]] [[Enchanted Hard Stone]] |time_rare = 7 Days |cost_epic_level_1 = {{Coins|250,000,000}}
256 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_stone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Hard Stone]] [[Enchanted Hard Stone]] |cost_epic_level_100 = {{Coins|175,000,000}}
256 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_stone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Hard Stone]] [[Enchanted Hard Stone]] |time_epic = 14 Days |rarity_low = {{Rare}} |rarity_high = {{Legendary}} |cost_total_level_1 = {{Coins|375,000,000}}
320 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_stone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Hard Stone]] [[Enchanted Hard Stone]] |cost_total_level_100 = {{Coins|262,500,000}}
320 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_stone.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Hard Stone]] [[Enchanted Hard Stone]] |time_total = 21 Days }}
